name: Desire
summary: Check out this fantastic CGI animated short film by the talented team at Red Echo Post, about a small robot who is born and sets out into the world, happily performing his simple tasks. Suddenly, in a small but profound way, the world as he knows it changes. What follows is a downward spiral of jealousy, resentment and unrestrained desire. This animated musical short features Rob Fetters' pop-rock gem, "Desire." Story, Direction and Animation by Scott Thierauf. Sound Design and Creative Collaboration by Grant Kattmann, Editorial by Theresa Bruce, and Color Grade by Chris Joecken.
